Class SpriteReferenceOccurrence

java.lang.Object
org.carrot2.labs.smartsprites.SpriteDirectiveOccurrence
org.carrot2.labs.smartsprites.SpriteReferenceOccurrence
public class SpriteReferenceOccurrence extends SpriteDirectiveOccurrence
Represents an occurrence of a SpriteReferenceDirective in a specific CSS file.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    final String
    imagePath
    CSS file relative path to the individual image to be added to a sprite.
    final boolean
    important
    Indicates whether the original css property has been marked as important.
    final SpriteReferenceDirective
    spriteReferenceDirective
    The directive.

    Fields inherited from class SpriteDirectiveOccurrence

    cssFile, line

    Instantiates a new sprite reference occurrence.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    SpriteReferenceReplacement
    buildReplacement(SpriteImageDirective.SpriteImageLayout layout, int offset)
    Returns the SpriteReferenceReplacement corresponding to the occurrence, taking into account the layout the the enclosing sprite and the offset at which the individual image was rendered.

      Parameters:
      spriteReferenceDirective - the sprite reference directive
      imageFile - the image file
      cssFile - the css file
      line - the line
      important - the important

  • Method Details

    • getRequiredWidth

      public int getRequiredWidth(BufferedImage image, SpriteImageDirective.SpriteImageLayout layout)
      Computes the minimum width the individual image will need when rendering.
      Parameters:
      image - the image
      layout - the layout
      Returns:
      the required width

    • getRequiredHeight

      Computes the minimum height the individual image will need when rendering.
      Parameters:
      image - the image
      layout - the layout
      Returns:

    • render

      public BufferedImage render(BufferedImage image, SpriteImageDirective.SpriteImageLayout layout, int dimension)
      Renders the individual image, including margins and repeats if any.
      Parameters:
      image - the individual image as read from the file
      layout - the layout the enclosing sprite
      dimension - height/width of a horizontal/vertical sprite
      Returns:
      the rendered individual image

    • buildReplacement

      public SpriteReferenceReplacement buildReplacement(SpriteImageDirective.SpriteImageLayout layout, int offset)
      Returns the SpriteReferenceReplacement corresponding to the occurrence, taking into account the layout the the enclosing sprite and the offset at which the individual image was rendered.
      Parameters:
      layout - the layout
      offset - the offset
      Returns:
      the sprite reference replacement
